data.message: Standing here, as real as can be looking on this city im feeling so free, they gave it to me as they gave it to you they aint got a clue what im doing through. Duty is done when they came down to me, now ive no choice but to wake up the people dont worry my equal is twisted and scared, i want no reward to show who i am, i dont give a fuck an i wont be leaving till my final breath is violent and its bleeding.
